definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: We obtain an upper bounded estimate for the convergence rate of the piecewise linear interpolation.
sentences.chinese: 給出了分段線性插值收斂速度的一種估計。

sentences.english: Return weld bead should be early layer segment or skip welding method.
sentences.chinese: 初層焊道應採用分段退焊或跳焊法。

sentences.english: Daxing fault in Jizhong sag is characterized with segmentation and variations for each segment.
sentences.chinese: 冀中坳陷大興斷裂具有分段性，且各段特徵存在差異。

sentences.english: Sublevel caving method without sill pillar is adopted in the south section of Fengshan Copper Mine.
sentences.chinese: 豐山銅礦南緣採區應用無底柱分段崩落法採礦。

sentences.english: It is compared with the segment linear interpolation method with regression.
sentences.chinese: 同時比較了分段線性插值加遞歸的信道估計方法。

sentences.english: Due to the complexity of the market, sub-distribution may be more accurate.
sentences.chinese: 由於市場的複雜性，分段分佈或許會更準確。
分段船舶和非機動船舶。

sentences.english: A computer-generated code with random, permuted blocks was used to assign treatment.
sentences.chinese: 使用分段隨機化的電腦隨機生成代碼進行分配治療。

sentences.english: Study on the section-division of superconducting proton linac is carried out in detail.
sentences.chinese: 對超導直線加速器的分段進行了詳細的研究。

sentences.english: The work on this block was conducted in the Assembly Shop.
sentences.chinese: 這個分段上的工作在裝配工廠處理。

sentences.english: Some conventional methods of sectioning of pressure pipeline system in analysis on water hammer are briefly introduced;
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹了水錘計算中常用的幾種壓力管道分段方法。

sentences.english: Furthermore, its tech-economic indices are compared with those of the sublevel open stope method.
sentences.chinese: 並將技術經濟指標與分段空場法加以比較。

sentences.english: The algorithm used for fragmentation is called a distribution scheme.
sentences.chinese: 用於分段的算法稱作“分佈模式”。

sentences.english: Third, ways to obtain land use right transfer, transfer fees can be paid sub.
sentences.chinese: 以出讓方式獲得土地使用權，出讓金可分段支付。

sentences.english: The detached fragment is no longer part of the replicated table.
sentences.chinese: 被分離的分段不再是複製表的一部分。

definition: to delineate/to draw a line/to underline
stairway to heaven/high mountain road/tall ladder on a building or other large structure/space elevator
